item.title: 消费者信心减弱，光速公司下调收入预期
item.description: 消费支出低迷导致光速商业公司（Lightspeed Commerce Inc.【原文：Sluggish consumer spending has caused Lightspeed Commerce Inc. to lower its outlook for the year ahead.】

item.title: 英国人工智能初创公司 Fyxer 获得贝尼奥夫和其他科技大佬的投资
item.description: Fyxer AI 是一家总部位于伦敦的生产力工具开发商，它已从哈里-斯蒂宾斯（Harry Stebbings）的风险投资公司 20VC 牵头的一批知名技术投资者那里筹集到 1000 万美元。【原文：Fyxer AI, a London-based developer of productivity tools, has raised $10 million from a group of high-profile technology investors led by Harry Stebbings’ venture capital firm 20VC.】

item.title: 波兰决策者杜达称七月预测是利率变动的关键
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会成员伊沃娜-杜达（Iwona Duda）表示，未来几个月波兰利率将继续按兵不动，央行对7月份通胀率的预测将成为潜在宽松政策时机的关键。【原文：Polish interest rates are set to stay on hold in the coming months, with the central bank’s inflation projection in July key for the timing of potential easing, Monetary Policy Council member Iwona Duda said.】

item.title: SmartStop Self Storage 寻求在纽交所上市，最高融资 9.72 亿美元
item.description: SmartStop Self Storage REIT Inc. 正在寻求通过发行募集多达约 9.72 亿美元的资金，这家自助仓储设施企业希望在纽约证券交易所上市。【原文：SmartStop Self Storage REIT Inc. is seeking to raise as much as about $972 million in an offering as the self-storage facilities business looks to list itself on the New York Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）希望在计划谈判前澄清塞内加尔的失真数据
item.description: 塞内加尔在恢复国际货币基金组织（IMF）的支持方面可能面临延迟，IMF 希望在讨论为这个西非国家提供新的融资机制之前，了解多年来债务数据是如何被误报的。【原文：Senegal faces a potential delay in restoring support from the International Monetary Fund, which wants to understand how debt data was misstated for years before discussing a new funding facility for the West African nation.】

item.title: 富达和施瓦布阻止贝莱德和德克萨斯资本 ETF 订单
item.description: 富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）和嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：Fidelity Investments and Charles Schwab Corp. are prohibiting clients from investing in money-market ETFs on their trading platforms, an unusual move for the financial powerhouses who typically permit easy access to funds that already trade on an exchange.】

item.title: 纽约市交通拥堵定价在特朗普的反弹中筹集 5200 万美元
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统和州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）仍在就其终止该计划的提议僵持不下，纽约市的拥堵收费在二月份增加了约 5200 万美元的通行费收入。【原文：New York City’s congestion pricing raised about $52 million in toll revenue in February as President Donald Trump and Governor Kathy Hochul remain in a standoff over his bid to end the program.】

item.title: 纳米比亚重组石油部以提高效率
item.description: 纳米比亚总统内通博-南迪-恩戴特瓦（Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah）周末进行了内阁改组，将石油和天然气更直接地置于她的控制之下，因为国际勘探者希望增加近海发现。【原文：Namibian President Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah’s weekend cabinet reshuffle will bring oil and gas more directly under her control, as international explorers look to increase offshore discoveries.】

item.title: BBVA 利润创历史新高，全年高收入者人数增加 28
item.description: BBVA SA 去年的高收入者人数增加了 28%，原因是一些地区的通胀率飙升推高了工资水平，而创纪录的利润也让奖金受益匪浅。【原文：BBVA SA saw a 28% increase in the number of high earners last year as surging inflation in some regions pushed up wages and bonuses benefited from a record profit.】

item.title: 收购公司 Ardian 同意收购 ICG 支持的可再生能源公司 Akuo
item.description: 法国收购公司 Ardian SAS 同意收购太阳能和风能开发商 Akuo Energy SAS，并承诺为这家总部位于巴黎的公司的 "众多 "可再生能源项目提供所需的资金。【原文：French buyout firm Ardian SAS agreed to buy solar and wind power developer Akuo Energy SAS, pledging to provide the funding needed for the Paris-based firm’s “numerous” renewable energy projects.】

item.title: 大亨马西伊瓦邀请英伟达在非洲建立首家人工智能工厂
item.description: 由津巴布韦电信大亨 Strive Masiyiwa 创办的 Cassava Technologies 公司已与 Nvidia 公司合作建立非洲首家人工智能工厂。【原文：Cassava Technologies, founded by Zimbabwean telecoms tycoon Strive Masiyiwa, has tapped Nvidia Corp. to build Africa’s first artificial intelligence factory.】

item.title: 法官驳回特朗普恢复驱逐被控黑帮成员的申请
item.description: 一名联邦法官驳回了特朗普政府根据《外敌法案》要求撤销禁止驱逐被指控的委内瑞拉帮派成员的临时法庭命令的请求，使法院与白宫之间的僵局进一步升级。【原文：A federal judge denied the Trump administration’s request to throw out a temporary court order barring deportations of accused Venezuelan gang members under the Alien Enemies Act, further escalating a standoff between the courts and the White House.】

item.title: 常年私有 "公司融资数十亿美元，IPO仍处于冰封状态
item.description: 众多备受瞩目的公司在私人投资回合中获得了数十亿美元的投资，这在华尔街引发了一场争论：在不得不进行首次公开募股之前，公司还能以令人瞠目的估值在私募市场立足多久？【原文：The billions of dollars hauled in by numerous high-profile companies in private investing rounds is sparking a debate on Wall Street: How long can firms stay private at eye-popping valuations before they have to IPO?】

item.title: 莱维敦播客一个真实的人工智能深度伪造恐怖故事
item.description: 讲述纽约郊区如何成为全球打击假色情的中心。彭博社、万花筒和 iHeartPodcasts 推出新播客《莱维镇》。【原文：The story of how a New York suburb became the epicenter of the global fight against deepfake pornography. Bloomberg, Kaleidoscope and iHeartPodcasts present a new podcast, Levittown.】

item.title: TPG 考虑公开募股收购软件公司 Delinea
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TPG 公司控制的网络安全公司 Delinea Inc.【原文：Delinea Inc., a cybersecurity company controlled by TPG Inc., is exploring an initial public offering, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 刚果总统称可能延长钴出口暂停期
item.description: 刚果民主共和国总统费利克斯-齐塞凯迪（Felix Tshisekedi）表示，刚果民主共和国可能会将暂停钴出口的时间延长到计划的四个月之后，因为该国正在考虑如何维持电动汽车电池材料的较高价格。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo may extend a suspension of cobalt exports beyond a planned four-month period as it considers ways to maintain higher prices for the electric-vehicle battery material, President Felix Tshisekedi said.】

item.title: 银行为 Flutter 意大利交易准备 25 亿欧元债券销售
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co）是准备出售约 25 亿欧元（27 亿美元）高收益债券的贷款方之一，这些债券将为 Flutter Entertainment Plc 收购 Playtech Plc 的意大利博彩业务提供支持。【原文：Bank of America Corp. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. are among lenders preparing to sell about €2.5 billion ($2.7 billion) of high-yield bonds backing Flutter Entertainment Plc’s acquisition of Playtech Plc’s Italian gambling business.】

item.title: 关税导致材料成本上升，美国工厂活动下滑
item.description: 受与关税相关的材料成本上升的影响，美国制造业本月再次陷入萎缩，同时服务业前景恶化。【原文：US manufacturing slipped back into contraction territory this month, plagued by a tariff-related rise in materials costs, while the service sector outlook deteriorated.】

item.title: 加拿大的波利耶夫尔承诺比卡尼更大幅度地削减所得税
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）承诺将比自由党领袖马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）更大幅度地削减所得税，两位政治家正在激烈的竞选中为吸引注重经济承受能力的选民而战。【原文：Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre is promising a deeper income tax cut than Liberal Leader Mark Carney, as the two politicians battle to attract affordability-minded voters in a tight election race.】

item.title: Verizon 寻求出售高等级票据为债务赎回提供资金
item.description: Verizon Communications Inc. 计划于周一出售投资级公司债券，部分用于为明年到期的近 10 亿美元票据赎回提供资金。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is planning to sell investment-grade corporate bonds on Monday, in part to help finance the redemption of close to $1 billion of notes due next year.】

item.title: 舜宇光学警告产能过剩将导致市场重组
item.description: 舜宇光学科技集团股份有限公司警告说，全球经济放缓加上创新可能会带来市场的 "深度重组"。【原文：Sunny Optical Technology Group Co. warned that a global economic slowdown coupled with innovation could bring about a “deep restructuring” of the market.】

item.title: Bullion Explorer 用新名称宣传 MAGA：美国制造黄金
item.description: 一家加拿大投资公司将其专注于美国的子公司从 NV King Goldlands 更名为 Made in America Gold。这一改名正值美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）鼓励企业将业务迁往美国，并威胁对进口商品征收不断升级的关税之际。【原文：A Canadian investment firm changed the name of its US-focused subsidiary to Made in America Gold from NV King Goldlands. The switch comes as US President Donald Trump is encouraging firms to relocate operations to the country and threatening imports with escalating tariffs.】

item.title: BE 模型显示，巴西经济衰退的担忧被夸大了
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的最新研究显示，巴西经济在高利率的影响下正在降温，但面临即将衰退的风险相对较低。【原文：Brazil’s economy is cooling under sky-high interest rates but faces relatively low risks of imminent recession, according to new research from Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦液化天然气过剩显示新兴市场需求脆弱
item.description:
该国的困境昭示了一个不为人知的事实：当燃料变得昂贵时，发展中国家就会停止购买。【原文：

The country’s woes signal an inconvenient truth: When the fuel gets expensive, the developing world just stops buying.

】

item.title: 系统性 "银行挤兑 "风险笼罩国会稳定币法案
item.description: 目前，加密货币市场中最安全的一个角落正受到热捧，这勾起了人们对之前危机的糟糕回忆。【原文：The current excitement about one of the safest corners of the cryptocurrency markets is bringing up bad memories of previous crises.】

item.title: 智利央行上调经济增长和通胀预测
item.description: 智利央行上调了 2025 年经济增长和年底通胀预期，几天前，决策者们曾表示他们并不急于恢复降息。【原文：Chile’s central bank raised its 2025 economic growth and year-end inflation forecasts days after policymakers signaled they’re in no rush to resume interest-rate reductions.】

item.title: 墨西哥投票前通胀放缓幅度超预期
item.description: 墨西哥 3 月上半月的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，墨西哥央行将于本周召开会议，考虑连续第六次降息，并可能连续第二次降息半个百分点。【原文：Mexico’s inflation slowed more than expected in the first half of March, as the central bank is set to meet this week to consider a sixth straight rate cut and likely a second straight half-point reduction.】

item.title: 瑞银招聘 RBC Capital 生物技术银行家，进军美国医疗保健领域
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）从加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）聘请了三位生物技术领域的投资银行家，以拓展其在美国的医疗保健交易。【原文：UBS Group AG has hired three investment bankers specializing in biotechnology from RBC Capital Markets as the bank looks to expand its health-care dealmaking in the US.】

item.title: Saylor's Strategy 在优先股出售后买入更多比特币
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "公司上周通过出售所谓的 "永续优先股 "筹集了超过 7 亿美元的资金，之后又购买了 5.841 亿美元的比特币。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy bought $584.1 million of Bitcoin after raising more than $700 million last week through the sale of so-called perpetual strife preferred stock.】

item.title: 瑞银重聘科技银行家卡明-维斯康蒂（Carmine Visconti）担任欧洲区高级职务
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）聘请科技交易员卡迈恩-维斯康蒂（Carmine Visconti）在伦敦担任高级职务。【原文：UBS Group AG has hired tech dealmaker Carmine Visconti for a senior role in London.】
